title: Riley's Pond
description: Due to content, the author recommends this book for readers age 16 and above.Riley Martin finds his life suddenly flipped upside down when his rebel older brother commits the unforgivable betrayal. When Riley escapes to his private swimming hole for refuge, he finds a beautiful stranger already swimming in the dark waters. By Summer's end, Riley's broken heart will be a memory, and what's left behind…his nightmare.Taylor Wilson's hopes for escaping the drama she left thousands of miles in the rearview mirror take a sudden twist when she climbs out of Riley's pond and into his life. Her dream for a happy-ever-after seems almost tangible, until the monster from her past rolls into town to collect his prized possession.Riley's Pond…where worlds collide, sparks fly, and a kiss "goodbye" means anything but.
author: Harley Brooks
